data.title: List of films aired on Nickelodeon
data.meta_description: This article is a list of movies that have aired on Nickelodeon, listed in the order they first aired on the channel. Listed here are the theatrical films produced by Nickelodeon that have aired on the network. (To date, not every theatrical Nickelodeon movie has actually aired on the channel...
data.text:
This article is a list of movies that have aired on Nickelodeon, listed in the order they first aired on the channel.

Original movies[]

Title Original air date

2000s

Cry Baby Lane October 28, 2000 Shredderman Rules June 10, 2007 The Last Day of Summer July 20, 2007 Roxy Hunter and the Mystery of the Moody Ghost October 30, 2007 Roxy Hunter and the Secret of the Shaman February 1, 2008 Roxy Hunter and the Myth of the Mermaid July 13, 2008 Gym Teacher: The Movie September 12, 2008 Roxy Hunter and the Horrific Halloween October 31, 2008 Merry Christmas, Drake & Josh December 5, 2008 Spectacular! February 16, 2009

2010s

2020s

Theatrical Nickelodeon movies[]

Main article: Nickelodeon Movies

Listed here are the theatrical films produced by Nickelodeon that have aired on the network. (To date, not every theatrical Nickelodeon movie has actually aired on the channel.)

Title Original

release Nickelodeon

premiere date The Rugrats Movie 1998 June 18, 2004 Jimmy Neutron, Boy Genius 2001 September 17, 2004 Hey Arnold!: The Movie 2002 June 25, 2005 The Wild Thornberrys Movie 2002 July 2, 2005 Rugrats in Paris: The Movie 2000 June 30, 2006 The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie 2004 November 10, 2006 Rugrats Go Wild 2003 November 22, 2007 Good Burger 1997 December 8, 2007 Barnyard 2006 January 19, 2009 Hotel for Dogs 2009 May 13, 2012 The Last Airbender 2010 January 21, 2013 Charlotte's Web 2006 May 4, 2014 The Adventures of Tintin 2011 October 13, 2014 Fun Size 2012 May 26, 2016 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2014 March 10, 2017 The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water 2015 June 30, 2017 Rango 2011 January 1, 2018 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows 2016 November 29, 2018 Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events 2004 June 14, 2020 Harriet the Spy 1996 October 11, 2020 Wonder Park 2019 July 9, 2022 PAW Patrol: The Movie 2021 November 18, 2022 The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge on the Run 2020 November 25, 2022 Dora and the Lost City of Gold 2019 December 2, 2022 Playing with Fire 2019 April 30, 2023 Blue's Big City Adventure 2022 May 29, 2023 PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie 2023 July 19, 2024

DiC Movie Toons[]

DiC Movie Toons was a mini-series of animated telefilms that premiered on Nickelodeon, produced by the then-independent DiC Entertainment.

Title Nickelodeon

premiere date Sabrina the Teenage Witch: Friends Forever October 6, 2002 Inspector Gadget's Last Case October 13, 2002 Time Kid October 20, 2002 Dennis the Menace: Cruise Control October 27, 2002 The Archies in Jugman November 3, 2002 Dinosaur Island November 10, 2002 My Fair Madeline November 11, 2002 Groove Squad November 17, 2002 A Christmas Carol December 8, 2002 The Amazing Zorro December 22, 2002 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea December 29, 2002 Treasure Island January 5, 2003

Mattel movies[]

In 2002, Nickelodeon entered a long-standing broadcast partnership with Mattel to air films and specials based on the toy company's Barbie (and later Monster High) dolls.

Title Nickelodeon

premiere date Barbie as Rapunzel November 24, 2002 Barbie of Swan Lake November 16, 2003 Barbie in the Nutcracker March 21, 2004 My Scene: Jammin' in Jamaica June 6, 2004 My Scene: Masquerade Madness October 24, 2004 Barbie as The Princess and the Pauper November 14, 2004 Barbie: Fairytopia March 6, 2005 Barbie and the Magic of Pegasus September 18, 2005 My Scene Goes Hollywood February 26, 2006 Barbie Fairytopia 2: Mermaidia February 26, 2006 The Barbie Diaries April 30, 2006 Barbie in the 12 Dancing Princesses September 10, 2006 Barbie Fairytopia 3: Magic of the Rainbow March 11, 2007 Barbie as the Island Princess September 23, 2007 Barbie: Mariposa March 2, 2008 Barbie and the Diamond Castle September 7, 2008 Barbie and the Three Musketeers November 22, 2009 Barbie in a Mermaid Tale April 4, 2010 Monster High: Freakout Friday October 31, 2010 Barbie: A Fashion Fairytale October 31, 2010 Barbie: A Fairy Secret April 17, 2011 Monster High: Fright On! October 30, 2011 Barbie: Princess Charm School November 13, 2011 Monster High: Why Do Ghouls Fall in Love? February 12, 2012 Monster High: Escape from Skull Shores April 13, 2012 Monster High: Ghouls Rule October 26, 2012 Barbie: The Princess & The Popstar November 16, 2012 Monster High: Scaris: City of Frights March 3, 2013 Barbie in the Pink Shoes March 10, 2013 Barbie: Life in the Dreamhouse September 1, 2013 Monster High: Friday Night Frights September 6, 2013 Monster High: 13 Wishes October 25, 2013 Barbie & Her Sisters in A Pony Tale December 8, 2013 Ever After High: Legacy Day: A Tale of Two Tales December 15, 2013 Ever After High: True Hearts Day February 27, 2014 Barbie: The Pearl Princess April 6, 2014 Monster High: Frights, Camera, Action April 18, 2014 Barbie: Life in the Dreamhouse - The Amaze Chase October 5, 2014 Monster High: Freaky Fusion October 24, 2014 Ever After High: Thronecoming November 2, 2014 Barbie and the Secret Door November 23, 2014 Monster High: Haunted April 17, 2015 Barbie in Princess Power May 31, 2015 Monster High: Boo York, Boo York October 25, 2015 Barbie in Rock 'n Royals November 1, 2015 Barbie & Her Sisters in the Great Puppy Adventure December 13, 2015 Monster High: Great Scarrier Reef February 12, 2016 Barbie: Spy Squad March 20, 2016 Barbie: Star Light Adventure October 2, 2016 Welcome to Monster High October 23, 2016 Barbie & Her Sister in a Puppy Chase November 13, 2016 Barbie: Video Game Hero March 26, 2017 Monster High: Electrified April 23, 2017
